definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[להב]] √ of foll. (cf. Ar. lahiba be thirsty [prob. burn with thirst Lane:2674], II. make a fire blaze fiercely, cf. IV; v. blaze fiercely (of fire), cf. VIII; Aram. [[[להב]], lhb] burn, in Shaph. Ishtaph. and deriv.; also [[לַהֲבָא]], [[לַהֲבוּתָא]] flame; eth. lahaba:; As. la‘;abu, flame, Dl:HWB 364).
